common_questions.question: What categories of products do you offer?
common_questions.answer: We offer fashion for Men, Women, and Kids. Each category includes clothing, accessories, and more. Browse by clicking the category links in the top menu.

common_questions.question: How do I find dresses?
common_questions.answer: Click on 'Women' in the top navigation to browse our women's collection, which includes various dress styles like maxi, midi, mini, A-line, bodycon, party dresses, and casual dresses.

common_questions.question: How do I add items to my cart?
common_questions.answer: Click on any product to view details, then click the 'Add to Cart' button. You can view your cart anytime by clicking the cart icon in the top right corner.

common_questions.question: Do I need an account to shop?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you'll need to create an account or login to complete your purchase. Click the 'Login' button in the top navigation to get started.

common_questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
common_questions.answer: We accept payments through Razorpay, which supports credit cards, debit cards, UPI, net banking, and wallets.

common_questions.question: What currency are prices shown in?
common_questions.answer: All prices are displayed in Indian Rupees (â‚¹).

common_questions.question: How do I check my cart?
common_questions.answer: Click the cart icon in the top right corner of the page. The number badge shows how many items are in your cart.

common_questions.question: What are 'Popular in Women' and 'New Collections'?
common_questions.answer: 'Popular in Women' showcases trending women's fashion items. 'New Collections' displays the latest arrivals across all categories. You'll find these sections on the homepage.

common_questions.question: Can I see product details before buying?
common_questions.answer: Yes! Click on any product card to view full details including description, price, images, and availability.

common_questions.question: How do I navigate the website?
common_questions.answer: Use the top navigation menu to browse categories (Shop, Men, Women, Kids). The Shop page shows all products, or you can filter by specific categories.

common_questions.question: What is the 'Latest Collection' button?
common_questions.answer: This button on the homepage takes you to our newest arrivals. It's a quick way to see what's fresh in our store.

common_questions.question: Are there any special offers?
common_questions.answer: Check our homepage for current offers and promotions. We regularly update with new deals and exclusive collections.

common_questions.question: How do I logout?
common_questions.answer: Click the 'Logout' button in the top right corner of the navigation bar when you're logged in.

common_questions.question: Where can I find size information?
common_questions.answer: Size details are included in product descriptions. Click on a product to view its full details including sizing information.

common_questions.question: What if a product is out of stock?
common_questions.answer: Product availability is shown on each product page. If an item is unavailable, check back later or browse similar items in the same category.
